content: malibu bulky mock cable hat materials yarn ~ bernat roving or any bulky weight yarn needles ~ us 13 dpns gauge ~ stockinette 10 sts / 17 row = 4 abbreviations slip1 = slip one stitch as if to knit psso = pass slipped stitch over with size 13 needles cast on 44 stitches and join in the round k1 p1 rib for 2 begin mock cable pattern row1 *k3 p1 repeat from * row 2 *k3 p1 repeat from * row 3 *slip1 k2 psso p1 repeat from * row 4 *k1 yo k1 p1 repeat from * complete row 1-4 5 more times begin decrease row 1 *k3 p1 repeat from * row 2 *k3 p1 repeat from * row 3 *slip1 k2 psso p1 repeat from * 33 stitches row 4 *k2 p1 repeat from * row 5 *k2 p1 repeat from * row 6 *k2 p1 repeat from * row 7 *slip1 k1 psso p1 repeat from * 22 stitches row 8 *k1 p1 repeat from * row 9 k2tog all sts break yarn and pull through remaining stitches weave in all ends
